official_title: A resolution to authorize K. Kirke Kickingbird, General Counsel of the American Indian Policy Review Commission, to appear and testify in the case of the National Tribal Chairmen's Association, et al. v. James G. Abourezk, et al.

summary.text: Authorizes K. Kirke Kickingbird, General Counsel of the American Indian Policy Review Commission, to appear and testify in the case of the National Tribal Chairmen's Association, et. al. v. James G. Abourezk, et. al.
